name: Tabung Memori
description:
This is a world where emotions can be visualized through the stars count inside the Jar of Memory. The jar determines the status of each individual in the world. Post-waking up, Ryan, 25, is alarmed that his jar of memory is almost emptied.

Credits:

  • Script Writer: Ichii
  • Artist & Designer: Kolah & Harii
  • Programmers: Nuru & Yon
  • Music:
    -Comfy Vibes - comfi beats (Lilypichu)
    -Foreverland - comfi beats (Lilypichu)
    • -A Vision - comfi beats (Lilypichu)
    -Agoraphobic Instrumental - Reprod Snipes (Corpse)
    -Endless Love - Kalimba (reenmawra)
